channel.title: CVE Feed for IndiaNIC -- Widgets Controller
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IndiaNIC -- Widgets Controller

item.title: CVE-2024-25926|2024-03-27T05:44:23.916Z -- IndiaNIC -- Widgets Controller
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in IndiaNIC Widgets Controller allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Widgets Controller: from n/a through 1.1.
